job_description: Bachelor's degree or foreign equivalent degree in Computer Science, Engineering, Mathematics, or a related field and one year of experience in the job offered or a related occupation. Must have one year of experience in the following skill(s): (1) designing and developing large-scale, multi-tiered, multi-threaded, embedded or distributed software applications, tools, systems, and services using: (i.) C#, C++, Java, or Perl; and (ii.) Object Oriented Design. The pay range for this position in Sunnyvale, CA is $165200 - $223600 (yr); however, base pay offered may vary depending on job-related knowledge, skills, and experience A sign-on bonus and restricted stock units may be provided as part of the compensation package, in addition to a full range of medical, financial, and/or other benefits, dependent on the position offered. This information is provided by Sunnyvale, CA Equal Pay Act. Base pay information is based on market location. Applicants should apply via Amazon's internal or external careers site.

Bachelor's degree or foreign equivalent in Business Administration, Management, Finance, Engineering, Operations Research, or a related field and three year of experience in the job offered or as a Program/Project Manager, or a related occupation. One year of experience in the following skills: managing operations projects from design to implementation for large-scale fulfillment solutions; experience with selection optimization; and working with statistical analysis and data mining tools utilizing Excel, Tableau, or SQL. Experience in program management, including managing, planning, organizing, scheduling, and tracking of projects from initiation, planning, execution, and delivery. Experience in working in the business procurement organization of a consumer market segment company or related industry experience in supply chain/transportation operations, direct-to-customer fulfillment/distribution center/operations, general management, or engineering operations. The pay range for this position in Seattle, WA is $126651 - $129800 (yr); however, base pay offered may vary depending on job-related knowledge, skills, and experience A sign-on bonus and restricted stock units may be provided as part of the compensation package, in addition to a full range of medical, financial, and/or other benefits, dependent on the position offered. This information is provided by Seattle, WA Equal Pay Act. Base pay information is based on market location. Applicants should apply via Amazon's internal or external careers site.
